Title: AN ACT TO AMEND COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED TWO HUNDRED FORTY ENTITLED " AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE SUM OF FIVE MILLION FIFTY THOUSAND PESOS FOR ELEMENTARY SCHOOL BUILDINGS."
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 505, October 27, 1939 ]
AN ACT TO AMEND COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED TWO HUNDRED FORTY ENTITLED " AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE SUM OF FIVE MILLION FIFTY THOUSAND PESOS FOR ELEMENTARY SCHOOL BUILDINGS."
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. The following items of appropriation under section one, paragraph A, of Commonwealth Act Numbered Two hundred forty are amended so as to read as follows:

"ALBAY


32
For the Oas Home Economics building
P4, 000.00


"CAGAYAN


128
For the Namungaran barrio school, Rizal
500.00


"MOUNTAIN PROVINCE


61
For the construction of Amduntog school, Kiangan
2,000.00


"SORSOGON


42
For the High School building, Sorsogon
500.00



Section 2. Item 33 under Albay of section one, subsection A of Commonwealth Act Numbered Two hundred forty is suppressed.ℒαwρhi৷
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, October 27, 1939, with the exception of the following item: Section 1: Cagayan, Item 128.
